struct  vpsissRszInstConfig
 Resizer instance configuration, there are two resizer instances RSA and RSB, both can be independently resize the input and provide independent output. This structure contains instance specific configuration like output dataformat, horizonta/vertical scaling factor etc. More...

 Resizer control structure, passed as an argument to VPS_ISS_IPIPE_IOCTL_CTRL. More...

 Resizer instance configuration, there are two resizer instances RSA and RSB, both can be independently resize the input and provide independent output. This structure contains instance specific configuration like output dataformat, horizonta/vertical scaling factor etc.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum vpsissRszFilterType

Enum for Selecting Filter type.

Enumerator
VPS_ISS_RSZ_FILTER_4TAP_CUBIC 

4 Tap Cubic Convolution algorithm for vertical resizing

VPS_ISS_RSZ_FILTER_2TAP_LINEAR 

2 Tap Linear Interpolation algorithm for vertical resizing

enum vpsissRszFlipCtrl

Enum for selecting flip mode.

Enumerator
VPS_ISS_RSZ_STR_MODE_NORMAL 

Normal Storage Mode

VPS_ISS_RSZ_STR_MODE_HFLIP 

Output is fliped in horizontal direction

VPS_ISS_RSZ_STR_MODE_VFLIP 

Output is fliped in vertical direction

VPS_ISS_RSZ_STR_MODE_HFLIP_VFLIP 

Output is fliped in horizontal and vertical direction

enum vpsissRszModule

Valid sub configurations of RSZ.

Enumerator
VPS_ISS_RSZ_MODULE_RSZCFG 

Module id for setting the Resizer configuration

VPS_ISS_RSZ_MODULE_FLIPCFG 

Module Id for setting flip configuration for resizer

enum vpsissRszOpMode

Enum for Resizer operating modes.

Enumerator
VPS_ISS_RSZ_OP_MODE_BYPASS 

Resizer bypass mode

VPS_ISS_RSZ_OP_MODE_PASSTHRU 

Resizer Pass Thru mode

VPS_ISS_RSZ_OP_MODE_RESIZING 

Resizing mode

enum vpsissRszScaleMode

Enum for Scaling mode, it can be either normal in which it supports 1/16x to 16x or downscale mode in which allows scaling factor from 1/4096x to 1x.

Enumerator
VPS_ISS_RSZ_SCALE_MODE_NORMAL 

Normal Scaling mode in which up and down scaling is allowed

VPS_ISS_RSZ_SCALE_MODE_DOWNSCALE 

Down scaling mode. Not yet supported, please do not use TODO

enum vpsissRszScalerInstId

Enum to define Resizer Instance ie resizer outputs. Caution: values of these enum are used as array index.

Enumerator
VPS_ISS_RSZ_SCALER_A 

Rescalar A in the RSZ module

VPS_ISS_RSZ_SCALER_B 

Rescalar B in the RSZ module

VPS_ISS_RSZ_SCALER_MAX 

Should the last num, used as array size

enum vpsissRszYuvResizeMode

Enum for YUV mode of resizing.

Enumerator
VPS_ISS_RSZ_YUV_RSZ_MODE_LUMA_ONLY 

Luma only mode

VPS_ISS_RSZ_YUV_RSZ_MODE_CHROMA_ONLY 

Chroma only mode

VPS_ISS_RSZ_YUV_RSZ_MODE_LUMA_AND_CHROMA 

Luma and Chroma both mode
